name: IOInterruptDispatchSource
desc: A dispatch source that reports hardware-related interrupt events to your driver.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Create a dispatch source that reports hardware-related interrupts generated by the specified service provider.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the dispatch source.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the dispatch source.

items.name: - SetHandler
items.desc: Set the handler block to run when the interrupt fires.

items.name: - SetEnableWithCompletion
items.desc: Enables or disables the delivery of interrupts.

items.name: - Cancel
items.desc: Cancels all callbacks from the event source.

items.name: - InterruptOccurred
items.desc: Executes custom code when an interrupt occurs.
